item.title: FT Most Read: Thursday, August 29, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Nvidia shares fall even as revenue more than doubles
2. Republicans worry Trump’s campaign strategy against Harris is failing
3. Fears of rise in UK capital gains tax trigger selling ‘frenzy’
4. ‘Obscenely greedy’ oil executives handed Swiss jail terms for role in 1MDB fraud
5. French authorities issue preliminary charges against Telegram CEO
item.guid: FT Most Read: Thursday, August 29, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
